author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text:
One must always remember that what you do to earn money doesn’t define who you are but how you earn & treat others.
Always take pride in your sincere work & if you see others working with sincerity,  encourage them.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: Sometimes, people feel inferior for the work they do. Most of this inferiority complex comes from the fact that people in higher positions tend to belittle those below them.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text:
Never put anyone down for the work they do. Any work done with honesty and integrity is valuable.
The idea behind work is to give us the capability to earn our livelihood. Whether you are a janitor or a head, if you maintain your integrity, you must take pride in your work.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: The best exercise for the human heart is bending low & lifting someone else up in life.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text:
The goal is not to be right. 
The goal is to be less wrong.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: Sometimes you go away from a person because your love deserves the respect to not be hidden as a petty crime. Disrespecting one's love is worse than being disloyal.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: One thing at a time.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: Be a positive role model for others, help others unleash their potential, guide them on their path & assist them in self-development. Inspire others by showing them who they are, not who you are.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: If you genuinely want to make a difference, you need to inspire others by showing them their potential. It will help them become self-reliant & it is something that will only grow with time.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: Most influencers these days boast about their own success & lifestyle to influence other people's minds & decision-making abilities. It is great to share your story & experiences, but such an influence usually fades with time.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: To be an inspiration means to be an encourager. To encourage someone, you don't need to showcase your abilities; instead, help them find theirs.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: Still figuring out, what I should treat myself for dinner.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: Something you expect is important for you to know, but might not be important for someone else to tell you.  Better accept it or find peace.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: They ask for an advice but they want to hear exactly the same opinion they already have.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: If they can't accept you the way you naturally are, and what you will share being together; then it's not worth it.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text:
The wealth that makes you feel unsettled & uneasy is not a luxury but a liability. 

Whatever work you choose to do, do it with honesty. Honest work might result in slow gains, but these gains are everlasting.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: Most people look for ways to make quick wealth. To have a lavish lifestyle, they even give up their integrity. They may have material gain, but they end up losing themselves, their sleep, & their peace of mind in this process.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: Luxury doesn't only mean material comfort but also comfort to your inner being. When you work honestly, you create comfort not only for your body but also for your mind & soul.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: You are a sheer disappointment when you pass lame jokes about the people who are behind the successful running of trains & abusing them when trains get late without having an iota of idea about the operational system of the Railways.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: When you truly love someone you don't judge them by their past, you accept it & leave it there.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: If both have a deep understanding between them & they are sure about each other, then no external issues can harm their union & their dreams ever.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life. 🌹

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text:
Humans we are, at some point or the other, we all need a fallback. ‘Who is your fallback’ makes all the difference.
Choose Well..!!

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: He needed a fallback. His fallback was Krishna, & resultantly, Arjuna was restored to his greatness.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: Arjuna’s predicament was different. He was allowing his personal emotions to dominate his sense of duty, & hence wanted to escape from the responsibilities he had towards upholding righteousness.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: Duryodhana’s predicament, in his own words, was, “I know what is right but I am not able to indulge in it. I know what is wrong but I am not able to avoid it.” He needed a fallback. His fallback was his uncle Shakuni, & resultantly, Duryodhana moved from bad to worse.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: To overcome hurt, one friend will ask you to take revenge & get even, and another will ask you to forgive & get ahead with your life. ‘Who is your fallback’ makes all the difference.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: People help you the way they know to help you. To help you to come out of stress, one friend will ask you to drink & another will ask you to meditate.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: It's important to make a journal of your strength & day to day appreciation which comes to you. So that in grey times, you can go back & at least find them in pages.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: Never wish them pain. That's not who you are. If they caused you pain, they must have pain inside. Wish them healing. That's what they need.

#Mahashivratri

RIP. Koti Koti Pranaam, Bhavanjali.
Om Shanti!!🙏💔
#LataMangeshkar

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text:
In the movie 3 Idiots, Aamir had rightly said- 
For some people, life is all about profit & loss statements. Whether while choosing an academic field, job, career, friendship, spouse, connections, place etc. Because as a human they are hollow inside & can't dare to take risk.

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text: A Electric Locomotive costs 15-22 Crores INR & these job aspirants even in anger set coaches & locos on fire. Even in frustration, how people can harm their own national property on Republic Day to seek attention? Sorry, these guys don't deserve to be inducted into the service. https://t.co/sZo3aXjhoB

author: ਅਮਰਿਸ਼ੁ
text:
Loving our country is as natural as loving our parents. Happy 73rd #RepublicDay India & to all of us. 🇮🇳
Once again, Thanks to Dr. Ambedkar, Alladi Krishnaswamy, N. Gopalaswamy Iyengar again & also remembering Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose, Rash Behari Bose & Mohan Singh today.

text:
